name: NFTYPUP TALES VOLUME 1
description: VOLUME 1: PROLOGUE. Nftytopia is a special island filled with pups who explore and play while they wait to be adopted. But something troubling has been happening of late...stars have been falling in record numbers. They speak of a dark energy that has been forcing them from their home. A brave pup named Hiro has decided to investigate. He has sworn to defeat whatever is causing the stars to fall! To be continued! .......Created by @NFTYpups. Music by Shakira Knightley.
